Empire City is an upcoming action thriller film directed by Michael Matthews and written by Brian Tucker and S. Craig Zahler. It stars Gerard Butler and Hayley Atwell.
Cast
* Gerard Butler as Rhett
* Hayley Atwell as Dani
Production
In May 2024, Michael Matthews had been hired to direct an action thriller film, starring Gerard Butler. In November 2025, Hayley Atwell joined the cast.
